articles.author: Nancy Tartaglione
articles.title: ‘Snow White’ Bashful With $87.3M Global Bow; ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ Crosses $400M WW – International Box Office - Deadline
articles.description: Disney’s live-action take on Snow White has come in with a global launch of $87.3M, including $44.3M from international box office markets
articles.content: Refresh for latest…: Disney’s live-action take on Snow White has come in with a global launch of $87.3M. From 51 material international box office markets, the update of the classic 1937 animation gr… [+1562 chars]
